Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Fantastic food and staff!!! Enjoyed every meal and wine from the 5 course testing menu!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: One of the best Restaurants in Amsterdam. Superlative service and hospitality. Food and wine totally on point. Love the place.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Amazing high touch service, delicious food, fun with treats from the chef.  Soft shell crabs amazing, tuna tataki was good but could have been cooked less.  Bread amazing.  Next time I want to try the Asian style fresh lobster

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: High level food, service and ambiance. The amuse etc is very nice. For main the exclusive fish of the day, lobster and bouillabaisse. All of them very good. The sauce with lobster and noodles can be less salty though. Additionally i think ‚Ä¶

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: While Corona let this fantastic restaurant to  be shut down, they as others have started with a takeaway menu. We have just enjoyed the fabulous Culi-box and truly appreciated every dish. Superb quality and an easy to follow step by step ‚Ä¶

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Amazing experience in the best fish restaurant in Amsterdam. Been there a couple of times and the service is as excellent as the food that is being served. As fresh as it gets!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Great food. The main courses are quite big, portionwise, even though the starters are tiny. Clean and refreshing interior.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text:
Amazing!! The best sea food you can eat. The chef is incredible.
The staff is super warm! The place is cozy, good music, all the place!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Visaandeschelde offered one of the best meals I have had in my life. I was with a good friend, the service was enjoyable, and the food indescribably delicious.  Is this restaurant Michelin rated? It should be. The flavor combinations were ‚Ä¶

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Food is okay! But due to high expectation, little disappointing set lunch. A bit busy for the staff to serve delicately, though they are nice.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: One of my best friends is Dutch, and he used to say that among the many good things he could say about his country, cuisine was not one that would come to his mind. Well, he should visit this restaurant, then reconsider! One thing I learnt ‚Ä¶

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Very delicious and creative food, marvellous taste and excellent quality. Unfortunately the service does not cope with the kitchen.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Really nice ambience and great service. Lovely meals served in beautiful ways and explained by the waiter. Nice for a romantic meal or just a celebration dinner with friends. The seafood is fresh and nicely cooked, without being too much, something not too common here.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Nice location, nice waitresses, good amuses, good fresh oysters, but very unfortunately the rest was not good. The bouillabaisse should be called a bisque with salmon  and shellfish, main dish was monkfish: a concrete with bad mushroom saus ‚Ä¶

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Very kind service, with nice amuse bouches to get you started. But very slow pace (over 1.5 hour to get main course) and very salty in general.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Friendly staff, great ambiance and music, delicious sea food :)

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Outstanding service, food and wine. Thank you for a very memorable experience and we shall return when we come back to Amsterdam.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Excellent fine cuisine specialized in seafood

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Classic fish restaurant, most amazing service and food! Please try the tasting of oysters. It's amazing.  Price for food and wine is about ‚Ç¨ 100,- per person which is a fair price for what you get.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Lovely meal, everything was exquisite and beautifully presented. Fantastic flavors and textures.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Super fish restaurant, Great dishes with lovely atmosphere.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: We usually come here for birthdays because of the food and the experience. I love the lobster here - simple and tasty. The starters always vary and are full of taste and creativity. Good wine list as well.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: very nice place for lunch with people. the serving was great and very kind to me.  also the taste of dishes was gorgeous to me. they serve some biscuits to try to eat. but no space for the disabled. you can enjoy eating in cozy atmosphere inside

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Very tasty and fresh seafood fine dining dish with high quality. Staffs are very friendly and attentive. Wine pairing was super. It is quite pricy though. Tables are too close to each other and the place were full, so ambience was not relaxing, but quite loud.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: The cod I had was excellent. Their dessert was just as good.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: We opted for the tasting menu  with wine pairing and were not disappointed. No bread service. Service was inconsistent - some were efficient and some could not care less - could be that it was late for them (we came at 9:30). But if you crave for good seafood, this is worth a visit.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Top, delicious very friendly personal

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: This restaurant is amazing! I ordered the chef's menu, that you can choose 4,5 or 6 courses. Food are incredible! When you look at it, u smile already, so beautiful! Of course, Service is amazing too! Every dish comes they will explain ‚Ä¶

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Professional service was the star of the show tonight. Outrageous! Enjoyed the chef‚Äôs menu, especially happy with the smoked salmon.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: This is probably one of the best fish restaurants you can find in Amsterdam. The plates look delicious and they are delicious. The staff is casual, but with a high standard and very friendly. The price is on the high side, but you pay for what you get: excellence.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Amazing dinner with electic mix of flavors and textures.  Very nice ambiance and superb service. Delicious experience!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Very tasty chefs menu

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Great place with fantastic food!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Extraordinary good restaurant. If you want to be treated like a King or Queen you should go to Vis aan de Schelde. Service is really good and staff is very friendly. You should try the 5 courses surprise diner and let the chef surprise you with extremely good fish dishes.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Delicious seafood cooked with incredible flare and inventiveness. I ordered the chef's fixed 5-course menu which comprised three small starters, a main and a dessert. However, once I had indulged in the sourdough bread and two amuse bouche, ‚Ä¶

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: I know this place for a long time. The last few times was there a long wait time for serving the food. Drinks were not served, forgotten by the staff a couple of times. Overpriced menu. There are better options for a fish restaurant in Amsterdam for the moment.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Wonderful seafood restaurant. Interesting, well prepared food served by very knowledgeable wait staff. Enjoyed the food and experience immensely.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Really great quality seafood cooked perfectly. I'm not a fan of mackerel but they even manged to make that nice. Would definitely return if I'm ever in Amsterdam again

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text:
Outstanding fish restaurant! Menu looks like and has a taste as Michelin star restaurant! Very good waitresses !
Highly recommended!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: The fish is very high quality, the way how is prepared is not my favourite but we spend there a very nice evening. Good attention to the customer but a little too expensive.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Very fine fish dishes and excellent wines. Great cook and friendly staff. Recommended!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: great oysters. the rest of the menu is equally superb, but very expensive. there are other restaurants in town with a better price/quality ratio. tables are quite close to each others.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Went on Valentine's day and had the 4-course set menu. The main course was a bit boring, but the rest of the meal was good. The courses were far appart so spent 3 hours in the restaurant which in my opinion is too long.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Magnificent place to eat. The sheer expertise of combining sea food with wine is excellent. Keep it up.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Fantastic. Brilliant menu plan, superb design and oh my god, beautifully cooked and presented by the chefs; a joy to experience from walking in to leaving. Would recomend to seafood lovers.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text:
Excellent fish üê† restaurant üç¥

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Supposedly high class Seafood Restaurant. It is definitely high class with its prices ..maybe high class with service levels but the taste and quality of the food lack behind of high class, there are better seafood restaurants in Amsterdam for this price range...

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Nice time. Great food, served mange bouche tester while waiting  between plates. Small space so very busy even weekdays. Must be booked in advance. It is expensive  ...

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Fabulous service and food! I can also highly recommend the place for Celiacs!

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Superb food, excellent service, great atmosphere. Get the starter selection for a little taste of each. Wine by the glass and different wine for each course.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: The best seafood restaurant in Amsterdam so far. Everything is prepared with gusto, attention to detail and very apparently with love. I will be visiting this place often.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text:
Excellent cooking. Classy wine selection.  Good dining habitat.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: Never tried so special foods before but...at the end the bill was extremely expensive, not less than 100Euro/person...whatever menu u choose. It depends in ur wallet if u want to go.

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: By far one of the best fish restaurants in Amsterdam. Excellent atmosphere, great delicious fresh food and an un-amsterdam good  service. Would go again.

Name: Visaandeschelde

Name: Visaandeschelde

Name: Visaandeschelde
Review Text: We paid 67euros each for a main course  - a Sole, a regular fish, catch of the day. That is a ridiculous price!

Review Text:
